PHRASE.LANG: 侍のカツラ（殿様・男性）
A men’s hairstyle during the Edo period. Hair on the top of the head is shaved and the remaining hair on both sides is tied up into a high topknot called “chasen”.[#Legal]
江戸時代の男性の髪型のひとつ。頭頂部の髪を剃り上げ、側頭部の髪を集めて茶筅（ちゃせん）型に高く結い上げたカツラ。[#Legal]
에도시대의 남성의 머리 모양 중 하나. 윗머리를 자르고, 뒷머리를 모아 높이 땋았다.[#Legal]
A men’s hairstyle during the Edo period. Hair on the top of the head is shaved and the remaining hair on both sides is tied up into a high topknot called “chasen”.[#Legal]
江戶時代的男性髮型之一。剃掉頭頂的頭髮，再將側面的頭髮束成「茶筅」（高髻的一種）的髮型。[#Legal]
江戶時代的男性髮型之一。剃掉頭頂的頭髮，再將側面的頭髮束成「茶筅」（高髻的一種）的髮型。[#Legal]
A men’s hairstyle during the Edo period. Hair on the top of the head is shaved and the remaining hair on both sides is tied up into a high topknot called “chasen”.[#Legal]
